description: Monitors the specified directory for images and attempts to extract flake geometry from them. If configured correctly, this program will also delete images that don't contain any flakes in order to save disk space.

spec.help: The directory containing the images to process.
The number of concurrent processes to use when processing files. This program uses a process pool to delegate work to multiple cores and/or processors.
How much to downscale images along each dimension before processing.
Display each image at every step in the flake extraction process with line numbers. This is useful for calibrating values like the noise floor and the rejection threshold.
The material file to use. Should contain information about the stack of materials present.
Invert the calculated contrast values before processing. (flip the sign)
The width (along x-direction) of the image at the current zoom (mm).
The height (along y-direction) of the image at the current zoom (mm).
